name.ja: <ruby>原<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>罪<rt>ざい</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby>－スネークアイ

text.en: Send 1 other face-up card you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 Level 1 FIRE monster from your hand or Deck. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Snake-Eye" or "Diabellestarr" monster in your GY; add 1 Level 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to your hand, then place the targeted monster on the bottom of the Deck. You can only use 1 "The Original Sinful Spoils - Snake-Eye" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
